title: Omar Ayub declared opposition leader in NA
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 02 (APP): Speaker National Assembly, Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Tuesday declared Member of the National Assembly, Omar Ayub Khan, as the leader of the opposition in the house.
According to a notification of the National Assembly Secretariat, the declaration was made in accordance with the Rule 39 of the Rules of Procedure and Conduct of Business in the National Assembly 2007.
Omar Ayubâ€™s nomination was proposed by the majority of the opposition members.
